overview: Farmers, John and Betty, can sense something’s not quite right on their farm in New York’s Wallkill River Valley. They are disturbed to discover their beloved cow has been mutilated and their crops wrecked again - all while someone (or something) stalks them just out of reach.
tagline: After a series of strange events, a small-town farmer awakens on a hospital gurney after being abducted from her home.
title: Awake
